question: Your English teacher has found a new penfriend. Write a letter to your penfriend and introduce yourself. Tell them what you do in your free time.
text: My English teacher told me you were looking for a penfriend, so I'm writing to introduce myself to you.

I'm 24 years old and I live in Canada.I'm working as an engineer. i live outside the city in a house with my parents and a sibling. I absolutely adore her and we love each other.We often hang out like friends to the theatres.I

Now about my hobbies and interests, I like spending a lot of time indoors. But I am a fitness fanatic too! I usually wake up early to jog at the park, and try to do yoga before hitting the sack. I always go swimming in the summers, as I cannot bare the heat. I rarely hit the gym, in fact detest it. I don't like running on the treadmill, while simple staring aimlessly into the space.I make it a point to go trekking once a month, and go to the sports club once in a fortnight.
I often watch shows on ..with my family over the weekends. I also read fiction and have a mini-library at home.
That was enough about me! Tell me about yourself. What do you do ? How do you pass your leisure time. I'd love to hear from you soon.

error_list.error_des: The pronoun I should always be capitalized.
It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
It appears that you have an unnecessary comma in a compound predicate. Consider removing it.
The word bare doesn’t seem to fit this context. Consider replacing it with a different one.
The word bare doesn’t seem to fit this context. Consider replacing it with a different one.
It appears that you are missing a comma or two with the interrupter in fact. Consider adding the comma(s).
It appears that you have an unnecessary comma in a compound predicate. Consider removing it.
It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
Consider using a question mark to signify that this sentence is a question.
